pr_title: Add an issue template for map problems

timeline.message:
Add an issue template for map problems

The issue template is similar to feature requests directing
users to the forums to report problems about specific maps.

Related to discussion in: "Where to post map problems"
https://github.com/triplea-game/triplea/issues/7351

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: [no-consecutive-blank-lines] Remove 1 line after node
timeline.author: DanVanAtta
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@
+---
+name: ⛔ Map Specific Problems
+about: Do not post here, search for a map discussion thread in forums: https://forums.triplea-game.org/category/5/maps-mods
+title: ''
+labels: ''
+assignees: ''
+
+---
+
+Do not report map specific problems here. Instead search for the map 
+in the forums:
+
+     https://forums.triplea-game.org/category/5/maps-mods

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: [no-file-name-irregular-characters] Do not use _ in a file name
timeline.author: DanVanAtta

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: [no-literal-urls] Don’t use literal URLs without angle brackets
timeline.author: DanVanAtta
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@
+---
+name: ⛔ Map Specific Problems
+about: Do not post here, search for a map discussion thread in forums: https://forums.triplea-game.org/category/5/maps-mods
